headline: Cuomo Proposes 8 More Tracks at Penn Station, for 175,000 More Riders
abstract: The governor unveiled an ambitious plan to add eight tracks to the stationâ€™s existing 21-track layout.
lead_paragraph: Pennsylvania Station, the busiest rail station in the Western Hemisphere, would add eight tracks to its 21-track layout under an ambitious plan outlined on Monday by Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo.
